msgs.text:
Bitcoin Magazine - Shirts, hats, and a really cool vintage Bitcoin mug. Not to mention the magazine subscription...
https://store.bitcoinmagazine.com/

Crypto Graffiti - Shirts, stickers, bags, art
https://cryptograffiti.com/

Hoodies, shirts, and a Diamond Hands HODL fanny pack, and Run DCA hats
https://bitcoinsavesgear.com/

Pins, stickers, magnets, and lots of apparel
https://btcpins.com/

Cryptocloaks - 3D printed Bitcoin products including Bitcoin grenades and node cases 
https://www.cryptocloaks.com/

The iconic "Tears of Bitcoin Haters" mug
https://www.etsy.com/listing/928388857/tears-of-bitcoin-haters-mug-bitcoin?ga_order[%E2%80%A6]1-6&plkey=646e67658bf32c53a030383a894ef2a08b35bddd%3A928388857

Bitcoin merch on Amazon including Bitcoin playing cards
https://amzn.to/3sElGH9

You can buy a fraction of a bitcoin shirt
https://amzn.to/3FKNLPT

Bitcoin Faded and Distressed Canvas Wall Art, 16" x 20"
https://www.macys.com/shop/product/stupell-industries-bitcoin-faded-distressed-canvas-wall-art-16-x-20?ID=10090472&CategoryID=190362&isDlp=true&isDlp=true
30" x 40"
https://www.macys.com/shop/product/stupell-industries-bitcoin-faded-distressed-canvas-wall-art-30-x-40?ID=10090477&CategoryID=190362&isDlp=true&isDlp=true

The Little Hodler plush toy
https://thelittlehodler.com/
Shipping is a bit high else I was about to order 2 of them. One for me one for my dog. <@782358286232977438> get one for max

Kialara physical bitcoin art. Looks like most is sold out.
https://kialara.com/

Bitko - Shirts, hats, flag, stickers, prints:
https://bitko.cc/

Plebeian Market
This is an MVP and an incidental idea on the way to a fully sovereign version... it's the first piece of a much bigger vision of decentralised sovereign commerce.

100% Value4Value business model... 100% donations to this site go into open source bitcoin projects.
https://plebeian.market/

Buy beef from a Bitcoin company. Beef Initiative:
https://twitter.com/beefinitiative
https://beefinitiative.com/

Bitcasa Homes - Real estate and Bitcoin BNB Marketplace 
https://www.bitcasahomes.com/
https://twitter.com/bitcasahomes
does anyone know where to find the shirt that just says "FEW" on it??
Check fomo21...and if not then <@702537444733485086>  can/will probably make it for you

Hey Apollo like Yelp reviews for Bitcoin products 
https://heyapollo.com/

I just refreshed my (btc-only) shop with some items you can HODL your warmth with - check it out here:
https://hodl.rodeo/

if you checkout using BTCPayServer (I have options to check out with BTCPayServer or Strike) and pay with strike you should receive 5% cash back, although i've heard that may be discontinued. if someone tries and lets me know the result (5% back or not) I'll give you a 10k sat gift/bounty
Bitcoin pub Pubkey in Greenwich village, New York https://pubkey.bar/home

Hi plebs, just opened a bitcoin merchandise store , check it out and let me know your thoughts. You can pay with Bitcoin lightning or on chain . use code cypherpunks on checkout for a 15% discount https://plebsters.com/products/trucker-fix-the-money-white-front-hat
Try providing stuff that's not directly bitcoin, I personally wouldn't buy anything that says i'm a bitcoiner.
Thanks for the advise .I think its a good idea. I will work on it. I still like my bitcoin hat  though, its  the same as waring your favorite football team â€˜s hat
Of course, you do you, I'm sure someone will buy it.

Feed chickens over lightning. Pollo feed
https://pollofeed.com/
I don't think that's true. I see a QR code I can scan and send sats to with anything

Orange clock. Cheaper version of block clock 
https://orange-clock.com/
